body.name: Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Body Lotion for Dry Skin Lotion Made with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Lavender Extract to Heal and Restore Dry Skin 20.3 oz, Pack of 3
features: FOR CALM, RESTORED SKIN: Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Lotion soothes, heals, and restores dry skin
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Lavender Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin)
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting lotion absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy
DAILY SKIN CARE: Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthy skin. Just apply to your skin for hydrating relief
EQUITABLE SKIN CARE FOR ALL: Skin health is essential for well-being. We’re helping the underserved get better care for their skin
body.description: Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Lotion calms, soothes and restores dry skin with a light lavender scent. This body lotion, formulated with Lavender Extract, helps keep your skin looking healthy and hydrated. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. The Ultra-Hydrating lipids in our lotion for dry skin fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. This lotion locks in moisture and promotes smooth, naturally glowing skin. The body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This body lotion for dry skin absorbs fast for rich moisturization and provides moisture all day long. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion for dry skin daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. Just apply to your skin for hydrating relief. This Vaseline lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America.

productInformation.name: Active Ingredients
productInformation.value: WATER (EAU), GLYCERIN, STEARIC ACID, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, MINERAL OIL (HUILE MINERALE), GLYCERYL STEARATE, GLYCOL STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, PEG-100 STEARATE, PETROLATUM, CETYL ALCOHOL, TAPIOCA STARCH, PHENOXYETHANOL, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, METHYLPARABEN, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), ACRYLATES/ClO-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, PROPYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA, XANTHAN GUM, STEARAMIDE AMR HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, CITRONELLOL, COUMARIN, GERANIOL, LINALOOL. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Lavender Extract, soothes and restores dry skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

CALM HEALING This body lotion soothes and restores dry skin with a light lavender scent. HYDRATING INGREDIENTS Our formula includes Lavender Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A LOTION FOR EVERY SKIN Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin.

Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion, with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, provides long-lasting hydration for nourished, healthy-looking skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration Body Lotion, with 1% Pure Aloe Vera Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, moisturizes and refreshes dry and dehydrated skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion, powered by Vaseline Jelly, moisturuzes and repairs extremely dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and feels wonderful on your skin. I get compliments all the time. It’s my best kept secret to wonderful feeling skin!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Felt so soft
reviews.reviewText: This product easily to absorb into my skin. The lavender scent was light and relaxing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buying Again. Feels good on the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion absorbs well, but was a little too fragrant for me personally. I do like it well enough not to return it though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the brand...Vaseline!
reviews.reviewText: This is one lotion brand I love because of the way it feels on my skin, non-greasy & sticky. My mom used Vaseline products and I decided to try it myself! I love lavender!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just love Vaseline lotions for my hands and body. Love the smells, lotion consistency and the hydration it provides. It doesn’t make me feel sticky and absorbs right into my body. I’ve been using Vaseline brands for years. I’ve been told my skin is very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hands
reviews.reviewText: Great product, could not find it anywhere else!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Goes on smooth, dry's quickly and not greasy.
